H0.text: Who wrote The female of the species more deadly than the male. Rudyard's contemporary, H.G. Wells

H1.text: Who wrote The female of the species more deadly than the male. Poet and playwright, Oscar Wilde

H2.text: Who wrote The female of the species more deadly than the male. Naturalist and writer, Charles Darwin

H3.text: Who wrote The female of the species more deadly than the male. Kipling

A4.text: poem by Rudyard Kipling, first published in 1911
